hackathon-description-text: This will be our first hackathon outside the San Francisco Bay Area, and we hope to see some new faces from the East Coast and Europe.
hackathon-rules:
Please see our code of conduct: http://numenta.org/code.html
You must register your hack here on this website by Sunday (May 30) at noon. You do not need to submit a video, but will present your work live in front of an audience at hackathon demos at 4PM on Sunday.
hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=111 8th Avenue, New York, NY 10011, USA
hackathon-description-header: Come hack on NuPIC with us in New York City!
